siteSettings.title: English Adventures: Future Perfect & Future Perfect Continuous

modules.name: Learn
modules.title: Future Perfect Lessons
modules.instructions: Master completed actions and durations before a point in the future. Understand the difference between completion (Future Perfect) and ongoing duration (Future Perfect Continuous).

modules.name: Write
modules.title: Writing Practice
modules.instructions: Write sentences using will have done / be going to have done and will have been doing to talk about future achievements and durations.

modules.name: Play
modules.title: Grammar Games
modules.instructions: Play games to practice choosing between Future Perfect and Future Perfect Continuous in real-life contexts.

modules.name: Quiz
modules.title: Quick Quiz
modules.instructions: Test your knowledge with multiple choice questions about future perfect tenses. Choose the correct answer to practice quickly!

modules.name: Apply
modules.title: Future Perfect Challenge
modules.instructions: Apply Future Perfect and Future Perfect Continuous correctly, especially in time clauses (present perfect, not future!).

categories.title: Future Perfect Continuous Forms
words: be going to have been + ing
